is primary.desc: Whether the location in LocGroup is the primary building in the group

is tenant.desc: Whether property is occupied by a tenant or not

convective storm rms.desc: Convective storm (incl winter storm) - for RMS users

ceded.desc: The percentage applied to the reinsurance loss after other reinsurance terms

placed.desc: The percentage applied to the gross loss entering the reinsurance contracts before other reinsurance terms

treatyshare.desc: The percentage applied to the reinsurance loss after other reinsurance terms

location group.desc: location group level reinsurance treaty risk

aggregate excess of loss.desc: AAn aggregate excess of loss contract applying per-period to a tranche of exposure defined using the reinsurance scope filter field

catastrophe excess of loss.desc: An excess of loss contract applying per-event to a tranche of exposure defined using the reinsurance scope filter fields.

facultative.desc: Excess of loss contract (sometimes proportional) applicable at loc., loc. group, policy or account level

per risk treaty.desc: An excess of loss contract applying per-risk to a tranche of exposure defined using the reinsurance scope filter fields

quota share.desc: Proportional contract applicable to a tranche of exposure defined QS using the reinsurance scope filter fields

surplus share.desc: A proportional contract where the proportion ceded varies by risk

layer.desc: all shares (insurer share of (participation in) location or policy)

location.desc: insurer's policy share for a location/site - % figure as decimal
